import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import AdminPanel from '../../components/AdminPanel' const AdminRevenue = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [financeData, setFinanceData] = useState([]); const [yearlyRevenue, setYearlyRevenue] = useState([]) const [monthlyRevenue, setMonthlyRevenue] = useState([]) const [weeklyRevenue, setWeeklyRevenue] = useState([]) const [dailyRevenue, setDailyRevenue] = useState([]) return ( <>

{message}

Annual Revenue

from {new Date(`01/01/${new Date().getFullYear()}`).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })}

KWD {yearlyRevenue.length ? yearlyRevenue[0].totalAmount : 0}

Monthly Revenue

from {new Date(`${new Date().getMonth() + 1}/01/${new Date().getFullYear()}`).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })}

KWD {monthlyRevenue.length ? monthlyRevenue[0].totalAmount : 0}

Weekly Revenue

from {new Date(new Date() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })}

KWD {weeklyRevenue.length ? weeklyRevenue[0].totalAmount : 0}

Daily Revenue

from {`${new Date(`${new Date().getMonth() + 1}/${new Date().getDate()}/${new Date().getFullYear()}`).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })} at 12:00 AM`}

KWD {dailyRevenue.length ? dailyRevenue[0].totalAmount : 0}

{financeData && financeData.map((finance, index) => ( ))}
Recent Activity
Amount Paid Payment Type Customer Date
KWD {finance.amount_paid} {finance.payment_type} {finance.customer_name} {finance.customer_surname} {finance.date.toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "short", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })}
Product Costs {products && products.map((product, index) => ( ))} {services.map((service, index) => ( ))}
Profit Margins
Product Name Price Cost Margin
{product.name} KWD {product.price} KWD {product.cost} 0 ? "text-green-500" : "text-red-500"} font-bold`}>{product.margin}
Service Name Price Margin
{service.service} KWD {service.price} 100%
) } export default AdminRevenue
